column4: I have a laptop, IBM Thinkpad on which I have installed Ubuntu Linux 5.04 Hedgehog. I have a slight question. When I choose "shutdown", the system takes the computer DOWN, but I never goes so far to really "power-off" so to speak. Anyone got an idea?
if/when this apt-get install finishes pulling down Kubuntu-desktop, I'll "shutdown" my gateway notebook and see if I have the same problem
